==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|お|こ}}
{{IPAchar|/woko/}} → {{IPAchar|/oko/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=おこ}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> The {{lang|ja|尾籠}} spelling is [[ateji]].<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おこ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Adjective====
{{ja-adj|infl=na|おこ|hhira=をこ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|痴}}: [[absurd]], [[foolish]]; [[indecent]], [[indelicate]]

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おこ|hhira=をこ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|痴}}: [[foolishness]], [[stupidity]]; [[indecency]], [[indelicateness]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|び|ろう|yomi=on}}
Change in reading from the ''[[kun'yomi]]'' of ''oko'' to the ''[[on'yomi]]'' of ''birō''.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|びろう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Adjective====
{{ja-adj|decl=な|びろう}}

# [[careless]], [[thoughtless]], [[rude]], [[improper]]
# [[shameful]], [[dishonorable]]
# [[obscene]]
# [[dirty]], [[impure]] {{qualifier|with regard to moral character}}

=====Inflection=====
{{ja-na|びろう}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|びろう}}

# [[carelessness]], [[thoughtlessness]], [[rudeness]], [[impropriety]]
# [[shamefulness]], [[dishonor]]
# [[obscenity]]
# [[dirtiness]], [[impurity]] {{qualifier|with regard to moral character}}
